# Creating Vectors

the c() function can be used to create vectors of objects

```{r}

x <- c(0.5, 0.6) ##numeric
x <- c(TRUE, FALSE) ## logical
x <- c(T, F) ## logical
x <- c("a", "b", "c", "D") ## chaacter
x <- 9:29 ## integer
x <- c(1+0i, 2+4i) ## complex
```

**Using the vector() function**

```{r}

x <- vector("numeric", length = 20)
```
